quotes.author: Stephen King
quotes.quote: Merlin is a top tier developer. He has been in the game as long as anyone, and has a real focus on the needs and requirements of his clients to ensure he exceeds their expectations.

quotes.author: Zcamt
quotes.quote: Merlin is a very talented and creative developer, he always manages to amaze with whatever he makes and is an incredible inspiration to the community.

quotes.author: Aaron Duran
quotes.quote: Merlin is an incredibly reliable and friendly developer. With his experience your plugin will be to your exact liking.

quotes.author: Nesaak
quotes.quote: Merlin is a wizard when it comes to coding

quotes.author: Slohth
quotes.quote: Merlin never fails to amaze me with the dedication and effort he puts into all of his projects. His charisma makes him a wonderful addition to any team and I recommend anyone to work with him.
